website_summaries.verdict: An all-in-one solution at a budget price to contain all the random objects typically found on a computer desk.
pros: Convenient hanging storage ledge is wide enough for papers and other objects small enough to maximize desk space
cons: Sliding drawer can get stuck  with larger objects

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS STAND!  DO IT!  DO IT NOW!  GO! GO! GO!
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT product. Maximum price/value proposition. Sturdy, well built, and very functional. I am able to store my large wireless Microsoft ergonomic keyboard under the drawer and the calculator in one of the pockets. The other pocket holds my phone. The stand set my monitor (non-adjustable height) to the right height for me. It has cleaned up my desk a lot. I liked this so much that I've ordered one for home as well!
customer_reviews.author: Darrin Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Keeps cat off keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: I like this. My cat constantly lays up on my desk right were the keyboard sits, and he would lay on buttons and do all kinds of weird things to my computer screen. Now, I can just push the keyboard back underneath and he doesn't lay on it any more. It is also a great height for the monitor; before I had novels underneath to raise it up. The only thing I don't really get/like are the 2 little side pockets. Not sure what they are meant to hold...would have been better is they went down deeper and could actually pens or pencils. As of now, I just have business cards in there.
customer_reviews.author: V.

customer_reviews.title: 2 legs were half inch shorter
customer_reviews.text: 2 legs were half inch shorter - see photos. As a result, the product tilts back and forth like an uneven chair, making it unsafe for the monitor to be put on top. Returned, because we could not use this uneven stand for our monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Irina Davey

customer_reviews.title: Nice Riser ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this item, mine came with no defects of any kind (as I saw with others) .. I actually bought two (one from Amazon and another elsewhere). I have my monitor on one and a TV on the other. As you might see in the pics, I am using the drawer on the monitor stand and I still have room to put 4 external Hard Drives under there. (Three are quite visible but on top of the tallest one I also have a slim Dell HDD.) Plus the drawer holds a lot of junk too. lol The item I got from here came quick and had no defects, I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Shot in the dark.
customer_reviews.text: Eyeballed it and it leveled out nearly perfect. The riser takes my 14lb monitor like a champ and shows no signs of stress. Side pockets are convenient for assorted items; I have batteries, a small first aid kit, chapstick and a nail clipper. Sliding basket is sized well and holds a surprising amount of stuff and took a 5lb test without any problems. Added bonus: My compact keyboard actually slides perfectly underneath to go away when I need to eat or clean or whatever.
customer_reviews.author: WLH

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't sit straight
customer_reviews.text: I had to return one that was badly warped. I ordered another and it is only a little better. I still had to put something under one leg to get it balanced. I like the look, the drawer and the storage underneath. The end pockets are not sized for pens and not welded on straight. I'd send it back again but chances are they're all slapped together the same slipshod way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received with a huge dent and mesh is not attached
customer_reviews.text: received with a huge dent and mesh was not attached; very sharp edges. i was going to return it, but i would have to go to the UPS store to do the return. Unfortunately, with COVID-19, makes it hard for me to go out in public spaces. I will have to trash this before one of my kids cut themselves on this. So, i will have to take a loss on this one. Not happy about that!
customer_reviews.author: sweetpea

customer_reviews.title: Returned this item
customer_reviews.text: Returned this item because it sat my computer monitor up too high... wish it was just a hair shorter. Then it would be better for viewing and better for my neck. As it stands, it's just a bit too high for typical monitors. Bummed it didn't work... the rest of the design was just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: I’ve never written a review on amazon before...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never written a review on amazon before but I felt like I had to for this product. The product arrived completely bent. Furthermore, the top part of the stand wasn’t straight or sturdy. I do not believe this stand could have supported my heavy computer without warping. I could press down the metal mesh with my hand. I already sent the product back after unboxing it this morning and will find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Reid Zuerlein

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I am using this product for a restaurant office. It was difficult to see the screen so I bought it to raise that with the added benefit of being able to put the keyboard under it for extra work space. It was so uneven that when three feet were on the ground the last foot had a huge gap between it and the desk. It was cheap and looks don’t matter much so I stuck an eraser under a back foot to even it out. Very low quality
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: 19" inside diameter for keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a stand that would allow my 17-3/4 inch keyboard to slide underneath because -- cats. Just reaffirming the answer in one of the questions about the product -- yes, the inside diameter is 19 inches, so my keyboard fits very nicely underneath, and the added storage tray and side storage are awesome bonuses. Sturdy and nice looking too. Very pleased with it. I'd even make a suggestion that this inside diameter be listed with the list of features, instead of having to sift through all the answered questions and customer feedback. It's an important feature, something quite a few people want to know.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene Clark

customer_reviews.title: uneven feet and need a bandaid
customer_reviews.text: Amazon has lowed it QA the unit came missing a plastic insert in one of the legs which makes the unit wobble. the black mesh is good looking and I think I can find something to replace the plastic inserts but when you buy a product you expect it to be complete. The unit has a small name tag attached to the top but the tabs that hold it on are not bend all the way causing a metal cut (ouch). I removed the name tag with a stapler remover.
customer_reviews.author: Beamer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive Stand - Easy on the back!
customer_reviews.text: I use this stand with my huge monitor and it supports it well. What a difference this makes in my posture while working at the computer. I didn't realize how I was leaning over to see the screen and putting my back in an uncomfortable position. It blends in well with everything else on my desk and the little drawer underneath is so handy to keep items I refer to often without having them lying on the desk in the way. It's very sturdy and the metal mesh offers great air circulation under the monitor.
customer_reviews.author: gma

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful addition to your desk! A must have!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny! This is perfect for personal or work related laptops. I’ve used it primarily with my work laptop. I love to store my planner or note pads in the drawer. I’ve even placed stray pages in the basket to keep it out of my way until I’ve gone through an entire stack of papers. For personal use, my surface pro fit perfectly on it. It was great to place papers I didn’t need for crochet patterns, or my phone in the basket.
customer_reviews.author: Queen

customer_reviews.title: Product as described
customer_reviews.text: Product is as expected, with the exception of a small bit of damage which I assume was caused during the shipping process and does not interfere with the usefulness of the product. This stand helps elevate my laptop up to the height of my other monitor, allowing me to utilize my laptop screen as a second monitor. The storage drawer is nice to keep notebooks or other reference material handy. It fits notebooks that hold 8.5x11 size sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Katie D

customer_reviews.title: Excellent height and useful
customer_reviews.text: I got a second monitor at school (teacher), but we don't have the desk space to use the monitors side-by-side, we need to use the laptop screen and stand alone monitor one above another. After several months of using reams of paper to boost the monitor above the height of the laptop, I purchased this. Excellent! No concerns, does the job, and I don't worry about the reams of paper sliding and making the monitor fall to the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L. Furman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Laptops & Computer Monitors
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these for our computers at home. These are good for getting your computer monitor at the right eye level to avoid back and neck issues. I love the pull out drawers under so I can put my bills and to do documents in it. I use the side pockets for post it notes, calculator, and other items. The "cage" material allows the laptops to breath and not overheat.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Hough

customer_reviews.title: HAZARDOUS! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two and both cane damaged where the wiring was damaged and ripped and it ripped my finger apart and drew blood. Corona virus prevents me from shipping them back and demanding a full refund because they are BOTH dangerous! I ordered one for my son and one for myself but he already cut his wrist on his - and I duct taped over his (his was the smaller of the torn wire) it’s that sharp and that damaged! Now they are going in the trash! Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: HCanfield

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $
customer_reviews.text: It looks neater on the pictures then it is. It really ends up taking up to much room. And little bulky. Also the little tray underneath Is not easily in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great ergonomics - stability could use some help.
customer_reviews.text: Using this allows my neck to be in a neutral position when looking at a monitor on my standing desk. I notice vibrations from my desk going through the stand and into the monitor, making it shake. The desk does vibrate, yes, but this stand makes it worse. I don't worry that the stand won't break, but it isn't sturdy enough/heavy enough to absorb vibrations. I don't regret buying it, but might look for a sturdier stand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amit Dubey

customer_reviews.title: It's a bit wobbly, because of the mesh structure, but what did I expect.
customer_reviews.text: My screen has a circular stand and the mesh has these indents on the surface of it, so part of my stand is floating a bit. Its a fine stand for the price, but make sure it is practical for your exact screen. You can also just put a piece of wood or something rigid probably.
customer_reviews.author: Monty

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with the drawer completely bent and the stand is all scratched up. The box it arrived in was not damaged, so it was placed in the box this way. Absolute piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Hadley Carter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Office Space
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a way to spruce up my office at my new job. I love it because it keeps me from straining my neck and looking down and it has all the storage compartments. I do think this was worth the price I paid because I use it every day and it helps with my job to be able to store things inside of it.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: Large & Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love this stand/organizer. I bought it to use as a printer stand on top of my desk and it's been a great addition to the desk. It's very sturdy and a lot bigger than I thought it would be. The drawer storage is great and the drawer slides in and out fairly easy. I like the side pocket storage as well, but I wish both sides had it, instead of one. Overall, I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Lyell

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This stand sits up much too high for me. About 6 inches off the table.
customer_reviews.author: S. K. Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: My product came to me used and damaged. There is a hole in the mesh part of the stand and the basket will not fit in its proper placement. It seems to have been broken and someone has welded it back together.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Performs its job well
customer_reviews.text: Works great for its purpose. I enjoy the small letter tray on tracks and the small pocket area on the side. It did however arrive with a corner damaged and a few dents. As the damage was purely cosmetic and did not effect the function I decided it was not worth the hassle of returning.
customer_reviews.author: Kody

customer_reviews.title: Does what I need it to do
customer_reviews.text: This works great for me! I wanted to get the laptop up...and put it on a laptop chiller, while having room underneath to store stuff...and this did the job. Under storage is good...put papers that I need quick there and I use the side for post-it notes holder. Very sturdy...no issues.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Great for your PC screen!
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my office desk and I was surprised at how much space it created for me! The drawer holds quite a bit---I think I probably stored too much in there! Handy side "pockets" that are good for business cards, keys, phone, or something similar. I love the wire mesh material because the surface doesn't collect dust. Also liked having my screen more elevated. This helps reduce neck pain from looking down. Very sturdy and would definitely recommend if you're looking to create some space and elevate your screen.
customer_reviews.author: Nutrition4Life

customer_reviews.title: Came broken.
customer_reviews.text: The slide that is on one side of the drawer arrived with a broken weld (if you want to call it a weld). I got what I paid for, but getting it broken is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Dub Bee You

customer_reviews.title: tall but awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. The only problem is that it's VERY tall. I took my angle grinder and took off just over an inch from each leg. Now it sits perfectly below my monitor and my keyboard can still slide just underneath. The sliding drawer/tray was a pretty tight and didn't slide easily but I was able to bend the track a bit to loosen it up.
customer_reviews.author: JMN

customer_reviews.title: Nice stand but it ruined my desk!
customer_reviews.text: I just got a new job and new equipment for my home office, so I had to move some things around. When I moved the stand, I realized the feet/rubber stoppers had dug into the wood and now I have these lovely marks on my nice Pottery Barn desk. I don't recommend this product. I only had a laptop sitting on it so nothing very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Tegethoff

customer_reviews.title: Good lifts to help organize my desk
customer_reviews.text: Just as described, I just wish the drawers could be reversed. I bought 2 and can only use the drawer on one, otherwise I'm not able to use the side pockets. Other than that they are good lifts, they are a good height so no more neck aches from looking down.
customer_reviews.author: DDR0825

customer_reviews.title: Omg perfect
customer_reviews.text: Tbh i thought this was a lil pricey... And i still do BUT, it was SOOO worth it ! It was 100% perfect. Its strong & sturdy. I use it for my microwave. And the lil sliding drawer & 2 side compartments. Again perfect !!! Ty
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Kirkman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the office
customer_reviews.text: Great for the office and raising my monitor a little higher how I like. The only thing I would change is the indents on the top that look like they are meant to hold a certain type of monitor in place or something of a sort. It makes my monitor a little wobbly if I don’t have it in just the right position. Other than that it works great and looks clean!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for laptop or small based computer
customer_reviews.text: This is great and good size for laptop or smaller computer base. I have a large computer and it wouldn’t work for my computer I returned it. I have a 32 inch computer with same size base ( bought after I bought this ) I originally bought for my laptop then found computer. The color was as described and I will recommend this product as mentioned above!
customer_reviews.author: Shellie Victory

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I found this computer riser to be very sturdy. The design was attractive. There is a nice little sliding shelf under the riser. My lap top easily slides under that shelf for easy storage. There are built in bins on the tight side for small item storage.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Been a couple months and I like to use the drawer to store my (medium-weight mind you) study books, slide my keyboard underneath the space between the bottom of the drawer and my desk, and it holds my pens and notepads on the side. It doesn't slide around when I use the drawer and holds my monitor to a better height to ease my neck pains and posture. It's also great to maximize space with consoles since it is not an enclosed space like wooden stands are, the console still has air flow while being under the drawer, store the controllers in the drawer (or game cases), accessories on the side, and playscreen on top of it all! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: BS

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy but it came bent so I’m worried about how long it be sturdy. It’s bigger than what I thought, I love the color and my keyboard fits perfectly under it. Just wish my draw part wasn’t bent, if I had pliers I would have unbent it myself.
customer_reviews.author: lita royst

customer_reviews.title: Spacemaker, spacesaver in one
customer_reviews.text: This put my monitor at the perfect height and added storage for a keyboard and files, as well as mouse and pens. I now have more room on my desk and my neck is thanking me. It is not super thick wire, but certainly strong enough to hold everything on and in it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gatz

customer_reviews.title: Too Big
customer_reviews.text: Too big. Takes up WAY too much room on desk. I tried to make it work elsewhere (sitting on top of a file cabinet, etc) but it's too deep. A monitor stand could do its job without being SO bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Martin

customer_reviews.title: very solid; works great
customer_reviews.text: I tried a couple of different mesh wire stands like this. I like this one the best. I actually do not put a monitor on it. I just use it to add extra space to my desk. I like this one because it is on the longer side, in terms of the width. It is also very sturdy. I do not use the drawer as such. I just keep extra paper in there. Overall, it is very handy to have a stand like this. I also got the Convenience Concepts one, which is made out of particle board. I like both of them equally well. Great way to add extra space to a table or desk.
customer_reviews.author: KN

customer_reviews.title: Mostly sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The product was larger than expected which was nice to see. Sturdy and matches other mesh items. The only unfortunately thing was the basket isn't really sturdy and very pliable due to the mesh. Mine came fairly dented and, although I was aboe to smooth most of it out, it is very noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty simple item that does its job well. I like the pull out shelf and side holders and it gives me more room on my desk as I can slide my keyboard underneath it. This was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Too big for me to use
customer_reviews.text: This would be a great product if you need your computer to be raised higher. In my case, it raised the computer up way too high. I ordered two and when I found out they could not be used in our office I farmed them out to new homes. This would be a good product, however, if you need your computer raised in order to use it
customer_reviews.author: Angela N. Payne

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: It is a good size to fit a large keyboard underneath. It is sturdy enough for my monitor. It has a nice size drawer but it sticks a little bit. The two compartment on the side are nice for holding highlighters, pens and phone. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: RitaRugRat

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: nice. It's great to put my laptop on, store what I'm working on in the removable drawer and keep some sticky notes in the side containers/pockets. I love that I can slide my keyboard underneath when I'm not typing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great High Quality Space Saver
customer_reviews.text: This is a great solution to save space, adjust viewing angle, and gain easy access to notepads/books/Office Supplies. It also has no wobble once it has a monitor on it which is a nice feature. Another very nice feature is the ability place your keyboard under it when you need to write. Also the under drawer fits legal pads nicely for quick note taking or studying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was a great addition to my desk
customer_reviews.text: This was a great addition to my desk! I needed more space to put stuff and this allowed me to raise up my monitor, store my steno pads and important info and still have room to place stuff under my monitor. It raised my monitor up to eye level which is so much better for me too. Love this and I am so glad I purchased it!
customer_reviews.author: Stanggirl

customer_reviews.title: This product was poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this product. I purchased this product because of its compact feature. It has a drawer and space underneath to store the keyboard, providing additional working space, and side pockets for note pads. I found however that the product had a tear on the top. I returned it for a replacement. The replacement was in worse condition. The drawer did not stay secured and kept falling off and some parts were sticking out that should have been secured to the frame. This desk riser was poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Your monitor will wobble!
customer_reviews.text: Due to the design of the stand being mostly mesh and only some frame structure, the monitor wobbles really easily if the stand or the desk is bumped. I'm not impressed and this is with a small monitor!
customer_reviews.author: E Ford

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: Hardly any assembly to speak of, but yeah. The shelf is removable, so that's nice. It's sturdy, though it does have a little give to it in spots... I feel like if you smacked it, you'd probably dent it pretty easily, but I don't worry about anything I have on it. I suppose the "Mind Reader" logo on it is a slight eyesore? It works, and it's reasonably priced. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bent out of shape, but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The wire mesh on top isn't flat, and the drawer is bent pretty out of shape too. Sturdy enough to hold my monitor and my laptop, and for the price it wasn't really worth the time to return. Was not damaged during shipping since the box was fine. I assume they are all just somewhat bent.
customer_reviews.author: Popeye

customer_reviews.title: Lots of storage
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice monitor risers. Unfortunately, they were too large for my workspace and I had to return them. I won't lie...I considered buying a larger desk to accommodate them...but my husband wouldn't agree to that. I had to return them and purchase a smaller set of risers with zero storage space.
customer_reviews.author: thatgirl

customer_reviews.title: Green Metal Mesh desk monitor
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know that these came in other colors. I'm so excited as I'm going to use it for my laptops. Really cool. I also use it to keep my printer off the floor and store extra paper in the drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It is holding my Thinkpad + document camera at a good height for Zoom meetings. The tray pulls out nicely, and is placed well if you don't want to pull it out to use it. It is a little high for comfortable typing, but I needed the height for the internal & document cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I love this additional height and the extra storage on the side and underneath. Great buy! Also great for using while in bed. The cool metal allows the computer to breath and stay cool
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Achieves proper height for an AOC 28" monitor
customer_reviews.text: The point of this purchase was to raise the screen height of a monitor having no height adjustment on its stand. It performs this job flawlessly. The two pockets on the right-hand side are an added bonus. I use either a T650 trackpad or M510 mouse, depending on the task at hand...it's a perfect place to store whichever pointing device is not in use. The slide out drawer is nice, too.
customer_reviews.author: TCTxPhoenix

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer (it not me)
customer_reviews.text: My neck was aching. I wanted to raise my monitor a bit so as to keep from bending my head forward. This works and has a the added advantage that it organizes the little gadgets that clutter your desk top. Because its an open mesh you can see most of the items and don't have to fumble around looking for that pen or your keys. I keep my wallet, my journal, my back scratcher etc.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick L Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Desk life
customer_reviews.text: Makes my desk more spacious.. Now other coworkers want one copy cats... Lol
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Jamison

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Works nice to give some height to my laptop While working at my desk. The only downfall is I wish the basket underneath was a bit more user friendly. Other than that it works great and is pretty sturdy. Also, it did take forever to receive.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Y.

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. Before I had books under my bigger monitor. I love this as I have gained a nice shelf for sticky notes etc. highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: WI Mom

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with defects but I can still use it
customer_reviews.text: Similar to other comments, it had defects but I'll try to work with it. Metal is somewhat flemsy so I can bend it back... Needs to be packed more carefully to avoid some of the defects.
customer_reviews.author: PVan

customer_reviews.title: NOT satisfied with the product
customer_reviews.text: Received the package today and the drawer is bent. NOT satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Momo

customer_reviews.title: Good stand
customer_reviews.text: I was worried by some of the reviews but decided to try it out anyways. I was really glad I did because it came in perfect condition. I have my 24 inch monitor on it and I can even set my keyboard on it as well. Has some nice compartments on the side and a compartment below for some miscellaneous items. Very sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, but arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: The stand looks nice and of good quality. I like the underside sliding storage. The reason for the lower review is because the stand came in dented. I’m disappointed— Now, I have to send it back for an exchange.
customer_reviews.author: kue1nh

customer_reviews.title: Are all of them damaged?
customer_reviews.text: It arrived damaged, I received a new one which was significantly MORE damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Stand came bent. Would reconsider and pick another monitor stand.
customer_reviews.author: Ry Ry

customer_reviews.title: Great but. Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this through the amazon warehouse as a “slightly damaged item”. I didn’t see anything wrong with it and has held up quite nicely. Idk why I never purchased this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Ambriz

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece, but the black chipped off.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this monitor stand, but I used it for less than a week and the black started chipping off. It wasn't abused by any neans. It just sat there with my monitor on it. If the black didn't chip, I would have kept it.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Linda

customer_reviews.title: Best office supply ever!
customer_reviews.text: By far the best office supply ever! The wide ergonomic base is my favorite feature, my full size key board slides right underneath the stand giving me more table top work space when needed. The open drawer face is brilliant, I can place and remove items without having to move the keyboard then open/close the drawer!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I think a lot of us are finding ourselves working from home. This computer stand was a great addition to my desk. Plenty of storage space and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: I got a new computer.. Which is way smaller than my last one that I had the monitor on.. I needed to buys something that I can lift the monitor... It is at the perfect height for me.. It has a tray and pockets... I love that.. And there is room to put the keyboard under if I have tons of paperwork to do... I would recommend this product.. Also it came quickly and packed nicely..
customer_reviews.author: michelle devlin

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I work from home and recently downsized my desk. I bought this stand to raise my laptop to the same level as my extra monitor. It works great! My laptop is now at the perfect height. I was hoping to be able to place my keyboard under the stand, however am not able to do so with the drawer in place. I removed the drawer (easily done), and now have the perfect desk setup.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's just alright.
customer_reviews.text: I don't hate this product, it's draw is decent for storage but it isn't really that sturdy when it's flat on the desk. It wobbles slightly. Also, you'll need to have a separate keyboard and mouse if you want to use it with your laptop because of how high it's raised.
customer_reviews.author: CeCe Liles

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic stand
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Surprisingly sturdy and lightweight. I didn't realize just how much I needed that little drawer in my life, but I'm so glad I have it now. It fits my digital drawing tablet, sketchbooks, and some other supplies perfectly. I liked the one I got for work so much that I bought another one for my computer monitor at home.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The storage piece under the top part arrived dented. It hasn’t affected the use of it though and I was able to pop most of the dent out. Is great for holding my planner. And I love the storage spaces on the end!
customer_reviews.author: kynsey flynn

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret! RFH LIFESAVER
customer_reviews.text: Love this and we’re RFH saviors! I have a lot of neck issues and this helps so much. I have my laptop on my dresser and was straining so much my looking down while I typed standing. I haven’t had these issues since they came in. My daughter got the other one to sit in bed and watch movies on her laptop. You won’t regret!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and Functionable
customer_reviews.text: I noticed that my posture was not the greatest after working my desk job. I quickly realized I had to constantly look down at my monitor and that my monitor didn't have the option to raise it higher up to eye-level. I chose this particular model as opposed to others because of the functioning drawer and convenient side pockets. My coworkers also have monitor stands and they have commented that they like mine much better than their's due to the design.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: My keyboard slips easily under the drawer and I can stow my mouse ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a 24 in. monitor and it raises it to just the right height. My keyboard slips easily under the drawer and I can stow my mouse pad and mouse in the drawer when not in use.The drawer slides easily and holds quickly needed items as does the bins on the side. All in all a great oganizational item!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Great in my home office
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when we re-did our home office. I love it! It gets my monitor up off of the desk top and allows me to push my keyboard under to create more workplace when needed. The storage in the shelf is a great extra!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for small desk areas
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought it for an office telephone stand. It is perfect for my needs because I love the room it provided for a large spare laptop that I sometimes use. The slide out drawer is great for small important items that usually get lost on my desk (glasses, thumb drives). Good price, good value.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Like having a new office!
customer_reviews.text: This stand enabled me to organize my desk in a way that makes sense - it's like having a whole new home office.
customer_reviews.author: Clare

customer_reviews.title: Great Stand
customer_reviews.text: I have neck and shoulder problems. This is a great stand for my laptop so I can have my screen closer to eye level.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This stand is sturdy and arrived undamaged in good condition. Whilst I'd read and measured the dimensions, when I actually put my 32" screen on it, it just ended up being too high for me to use comfortably. So sadly I had to send it back because I really liked it
customer_reviews.author: Jodie B

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected, worked out perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my new home office, didn't expect much, frankly. The drawer is a bit loose, but is sturdy enough for me to frequently slide out, lean on and take notes over my keyboard during my workday. Keyboard fits perfectly underneath for storage in the evenings.The rubber feet keep it from scratching my desk, which I hadn't thought about, so that's a definite plus. Well worth the twenty bucks, and matches all the other black mesh office stuff I've picked up a piece at a time, even though the brands are different.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Christiano

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is great for my dual monitors at work. I needed a height and this is perfect. Love how sturdy it is and love the little storage option on the side. Definitely recommend this
customer_reviews.author: PukhtanaPrincess

customer_reviews.title: The pull out drawer and the side storage are excellent for normal desk items
customer_reviews.text: I'm actually using this monitor stand as a laptop stand. It has no problem handling the weight of a larger laptop. It's wide enough that I can fit a full-sized keyboard under it. The pull out drawer and the side storage are excellent for normal desk items. I may buy a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The product was so dented that it didn’t stand properly. The paint was chipped and material was poor quality. It was as if someone had shipped an item that was meant for the trash. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Nakayama

customer_reviews.title: Great Piece but...
customer_reviews.text: I really like these, they are the perfect size and height for my desk BUT that said, both of them came with broken parts. The wire mesh on both of them was broken in multiple places which is a pain and snags on everything.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Miller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Quality and size
customer_reviews.text: This is huge. Bugger than what i thought it was going to be but in a good way. It is very very sturdy. I am pretty sure I could stand on it without it breaking. Good for extra large monitors and small or even a 40 in tv. Plus the open storage drawer underneath is a nice touch and i constantly have items to put under there. lol
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie J Gale

customer_reviews.title: Great for large work space.
customer_reviews.text: It's very large & too high for a standard size desk. I ended up using it as a shelf. Very nice product. Just needs a big desk!!! Also sits high...so an adjustable desk or chair.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnne

customer_reviews.title: Wonky and broken
customer_reviews.text: Arrived bent, wonky and broken. Caught my shirt on the broken metal and nearly ripped a hole in it. I don’t like the condition of this product and will not be using it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Gideon

customer_reviews.title: Great stand for a great price - sturdy, well made
customer_reviews.text: This a very nice stand. Higher than most and perfect for my monitor - no neck strain. Very sturdy and well made. The drawer is handy for keeping my notepad and file folders (large enough to hold 8.5x11). The side slots are great for holding my computer glasses and smaller items.
customer_reviews.author: TamiJ

customer_reviews.title: Huge but great functionality if you have the space
customer_reviews.text: These are a great quality, but measure your work space. I got two, and even one was too big! Fortunately a taller colleague was able to use them and they're good for him. The drawer and organizers were the sell for me - they are very functional, but do require some space.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the money.
customer_reviews.text: They are made with somewhat flimsy mesh metal. The first shipment was damaged, one had a hole. They sent out replacements very fast. I’m just not sure that I would buy them again. I ended up using one for the printer. I did not like any of the computers on them. We’ll see.
customer_reviews.author: April Marie McKenna

customer_reviews.title: It was good
customer_reviews.text: This blue stand helped the monitor get higher so they can see more cause there tall.
customer_reviews.author: Alecia Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop stand!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to raise my laptop and work and it is perfect! I love the pull out shelf on the bottom to hold notebooks or paperwork. I rarely use the side compartments, but when I do it's usually to hold my phone or chapstick or something.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Boykin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and useful
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 86 year old mom’s desktop computer. It raises it to the oerfect height, so she no longer has to hunch over to read the screen. Side pockets great for pens, pencils and small pads of paper, shelf underneath perfect for printer paper. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Carolinda

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 22" all-in-one computer and I was worried that it would be too heavy for this. But it's not. No sagging in the middle or anything. Its light and you would think for the price that it wouldn't hold much but surprisingly its well crafted and holds up under the weight! Thanks for a cheap, great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

product_meta.title: Mind Reader MESHMONSTA-BLK Metal Mesh Monitor Stand and Desk Organizer with Drawer, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackInstantly improve your work experience with DURABLE & LIGHTWEIGHT monitor stands and computer risers. Use with most flat screen display monitors or televisions, laptops, printers and more - they are stylish and neutral in design so they will coordinate with any at work or home office décor. A great wey to reduce STRESS, NECK AND BACK PAIN - Raise computer monitors, laptops and tv displays to a comfortable viewing position for more optimal work conditions while improving neck position - helps to reduce back pain caused by poor posture while working or watching tv. ANTI SLIP CONSTRUCTION keeps units still while you work. EXTRA STORAGE IS A PLUS - additional organizational space is always a benefit, even if it's just to hold your pencils, pens and post-its. Looking for a place for your keyboard or papers, slide them underneath the riser drawer to create additional organization for yourself. PERFECT FOR HOME AND OFFICE USE: Enjoy improved performance and work efficiencies with these monitor or tv stands while you work or watch tv - LED, LCD, OLED Flat Screen Displays, iMac, desktop PC and more PLUS Storage. SPACE SAVING UNIT WITH DRAWER: Computer and monitor risers create additional storage on your desk, table or home entertainment furniture by raising your device off of the surface - store magazines, pencils, paper and more in the built-in drawer. ORGANIZATIONAL AND STORAGE: Improve overall organization on your desk or home office - add more desk surface by lifting your monitor up onto a desktop or tabletop stand - store pens, pencils and office supplies inside. REDUCE EYE STRAIN: Creating an optimal work or entertainment viewing experience is critical for eye, neck and back strain - sitting at the recommended distance from your device will help to reduce pain due to poor posture. STUDENT MUST HAVE: The perfect addition to any dorm room - create a comfortable and safe study environment for hours of studying on computer or tablet device or for TV viewing with friends. Metal monitor or computer risers are always EASY TO CARE FOR AND CLEAN. Clean your monitor stand riser with damp cloth for long lasting use and storage as needed. These monitor or tv screen stands make great gifts for the holidays, people who work at home or students going off to college. Perfect for all ages and both guys and gals, computer stands or risers can be used in any room in your home. Lift things off the counter in the kitchen to create more space and organize your recipes inside and place tv or iPad for easy viewing while cooking on top. Perfect for the bedroom to raise your tv to the right viewing height. They make a great back to college gift for students or first time students going off to school.
feature_bullets: STRONG LIGHTWEIGHT AND STYLISH: Heavy duty metal mesh monitor stand is lightweight, riser fits most flat screen display monitors or televisions, laptops, printers and more - coordinates with any work or home office décor.

STRESS AND NECK PAIN REDUCTION: Raises computer monitors, laptops and tv displays to a comfortable viewing position for more optimal work conditions while improving neck position - helps to reduce back pain caused by poor posture while working or watching tv.

NON-SLIP DESIGN PLUS BUILT-IN STORAGE: Mesh riser stand offers non-skid feet to reduce shifting of support stands while sitting on table or desk surfaces - solid and sturdy metal construction is optimal for home and office use - plus a place small office supplies built into the stand - slide most keyboards underneath.

PERFECT FOR HOME AND OFFICE USE: Enjoy improved performance and work efficiencies with these monitor or tv stands while you work or watch tv - LED, LCD, OLED Flat Screen Displays, iMac, desktop PC and more PLUS Storage.

SPACE SAVING UNIT WITH DRAWER: Computer and monitor risers create additional storage on your desk, table or home entertainment furniture by raising your device off of the surface - store magazines, pencils, paper and more in the built-in drawer.

ORGANIZATIONAL AND STORAGE: Improve overall organization on your desk or home office - add more desk surface by lifting your monitor up onto a desktop or tabletop stand - store pens, pencils and office supplies inside.

REDUCE EYE STRAIN: Creating an optimal work or entertainment viewing experience is critical for eye, neck and back strain - sitting at the recommended distance from your device will help to reduce pain due to poor posture.
STUDENT MUST HAVE: The perfect addition to any dorm room - create a comfortable and safe study environment for hours of studying on computer or tablet device or for TV viewing with friends.
MEASUREMENTS: Mind Reader storage computer riser stand measures approximately 20" wide x 11. 5" long x 5. 6" high.
EASY CARE AND CLEAN: Keep your monitor stand riser with damp cloth for long lasting use and storage as needed.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,005 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Metal Mesh Monitor Stand with Drawer, Black
